description: From movie "The Seven Year Itch". Crisis in marriage around 7th year.

examples.chinese: 俩人未能走过七年之痒便结束
examples.translation: The two couldn't pass the seven-year itch and ended it

examples.chinese: 双方婚变或许已分居,七年之痒亮红灯
examples.translation: Couple might have separated due to marriage crisis, seven-year itch red light
